thing-type.description: Single Wall Outlet<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt120 VAC 15 Amp Duplex Receptacle</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<ol&gt<li&gtPrepare the Controller to include a unit to the network. The WO15Z-1 must be in its permanently installed location.</li&gt <li&gtPress the button on the WO15Z-1 once.</li&gt <li&gtYou should see an indication on your Controller that the “DEVICE WAS INCLUDED” in the network.</li&gt </ol&gt<br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<ol&gt<li&gtSet the Controller into Removal Mode and follow its instruction to delete the<br /&gtWO15Z-1 from the Controller.</li&gt <li&gtRemove the switch by pressing the button twice.</li&gt <li&gtYou should see an indication on your Controller that the “device was removed” from the network.</li&gt </ol&gt
